title: Energy Healing for Animals

Amazing resource for healing your pets that anyone can do! Once again, Joan Ranquet has created an amazing resource for caring & loving our beloved companions in her latest book "Energy Healing for Animals." I'm almost done with the book and I wish it would never end. Anyone that has a special furry, finned, or feathered friend in their life needs this amazing hands-on guide to healing, which is loaded with easy tips and techniques that anyone can do.
